titles: Three letters to Dr. Sherlock concerning church-communion wherein 'tis enquired whether the doctor's notion of church communion be not too narrow and uncharitable, both to dissenters, and men of larger principles / by a lay-man of the Church of England ...
author: Atwood, William, d. 1705?
Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
notes: Attributed to William Atwood. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
